agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Assessment of State and Federal Mandates
series_description: This series documents the Department of Education's review and assessment of the various statutory requirements on local governments.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents requests for permission, whether granted or denied, by DOE or of DOE, to use copyrighted materials. Includes the tracking log.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of general correspondence and information regarding correspondence schools and enrollment statistics. Also includes annually filed affidavits.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Requests for Waivers for Pre-Labor Day Opening
series_description: This series consists of requests from school divisions to open prior to Labor Day and approval or disapproval by Department of Education

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Statement of Compliance with the Standards of Quality
series_description: This series documents local school division compliance with

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series consists of applications from students across the state requesting to participate in the 12-member Student Advisory Committee. The SAC students serve for one school year, offering recommendations from a student perspective to the Board of Education.
retention_statement: Retain until end of fiscal year then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.
